rules_text:
Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.
Exile the top card of your library. You may play it until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]“So it seems this Vorzanthirax wishes to close the rift to the Eternities, perhaps to reignite his spark.” Simul posited to Eiyo and Alexa. Vali looked haunted. “That would reawaken Doln.”[/i]
